Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.dbselection

Class Summary
ClientHelper This class does the actual ranking score calculation.
DBSelectionServer this class runs under soap server, export method processInput(String type, String input), where type can be search: to query the rankings of available collections on given term add: to add a sdarts server with optional collection names; or remove: to remove a collection from given sdarts server
Index a wrapper class to hold a collection's server url, collection's name, description and it's index the index is in the form of a HashMap, with the term as key, and doc_freq as value
